duties_responsibilities.duty: Develop and deliver IT solutions for the business and customers, analyzing trends in technology and providing assessments and solutions to address technology and business issues.
Lead and mentor staff, accountable for hardware and software planning, vendor selection, acquisition, problem resolution, set-up integration, testing, and installation.
Contribute to the development of annual technology solution plans, assess customer requirements, and analyze the architecture of business events and data to present recommendations to management.
Manage all aspects of systems analysis, design, development, installation, maintenance, and enhancement for mission-critical application systems for an assigned business unit/area.
Responsible for all aspects of budget for supported products and services, and contributes to and influences the development of standards and decisions regarding changes to systems/applications.

Responsible for vendor management and contract negotiation of supported products and services, as well as participating on advisory level counsels to drive strategy and roadmap for supported product and services.
Manage the technical interface to the business unit/customers, ensuring technology solutions are compliant with architectural standards and established methodologies and practices.
Organize and coordinate the activities associated with installation, deployment, and upgrade of software, hardware, and network facilities as it relates to the environment.
Manage the day-to-day activities of the assigned area, providing leadership, direction, and growth opportunities to members of the department.
Develop and deliver training for internal IT and external users to ensure productive use of existing and new systems.
Work to ensure processes are integrated to support expected customer needs and service levels, and build and maintain good relationships with customers.
Be aware of risk within their functional area, raising and reporting known or suspected violations to the appropriate Company authority in a timely fashion.
Perform other related duties as required.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor's Degree in Computer Science, Information Systems, or related field (Master's preferred)
